column1: Smoque BBQ////as i stepped inside the building
column2: i quickly realized how supposedly "well known" the place was. there was a picture of "that guy" i saw i think on food network? i was never a fan of the guy and never thought his attempts of being funny was working. anyway
column3: so yeah the guy probably visited this place
column4: big deal. give me the ribs and let me decide for my self.
